means: <希神>阿里阿德涅（国王Minos的女儿，曾给情人Theseus一个线团，帮助他走出迷宫）
[女子名] 阿里亚德妮来源于希腊语，含义是“至圣”(most holy)

sentence.Network_en: I could not ask Ariadne to sit for you, because the painting is a secret.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不能够把亚里亚德纳请来让你画, 因为这是一桩秘密.

sentence.Network_en: What's more, Ariadne was abducted before Theseus could confess his love!
sentence.Network_cn: 更重要的是, 阿莉亚多尼被绑架前忒修斯可以承认他的爱!

sentence.Network_en: We need an Ariadne's thread to guide us through all these difficulties.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们真需要有人指点迷津,领我们走出这重重困境.

PerfectNetExp.abs: │││ ├冰清绢蝶 Parnassius citrinarius (=[Parnassius glacialis])│││ ├艾雯绢蝶 Parnassius eversmanni│││ ├爱侣绢蝶 Parnassius ariadne│││ ├珍珠.
ariadna 阿里亚德娜, ariadne 阿莉阿德尼, ariadna 阿里阿德娜
ariadna 阿里阿德娜, ariadne 阿里亚德妮, ariadne 阿莉阿德尼

means.word_mean: 1. beautiful daughter of Minos and Pasiphae; she fell in love with Theseus and gave him the thread with which he found his way out of the Minotaur's labyrinth

auth_sentence.content: Ariadne lay on the silver sands.
